org.takes.rs

Class RsWithBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.takes.rs.RsWithBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Response

    public final class RsWithBody
extends Object
implements Response
    Response decorator, with body.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)
